projects.name: EventHub
projects.description: Microservices project that simplifies event management. It's a platform where you can easily organize and manage upcoming virtual or in-person meetups, conferences, and competitions.

projects.name: PixBy
projects.description: A Modern Full Stack Social Media App where users can connect with other people and share their photos.

projects.name: Hyperion
projects.description: Blockchain project aims to implement the core functionality of a blockchain, including the ability to add new blocks to the chain, verify the integrity of the chain and secure the data stored in the blocks using cryptographic hashes.

projects.name: Decent Mail
projects.description: Decent Mail is a blockchain-powered email service enabling users to securely exchange emails through smart contracts, using peer-to-peer interactions and granting users full control over their data and information.

projects.name: Hype The Hike
projects.description: Hype The Hike is an innovative project utilizing NFT technology to enhance the functionality and security of event tickets, empowering community-driven tourism and preserving valuable memories while leveraging blockchain-based authentication and storage systems.
